Classification Scheme Data Models (I)
Patterns for Re-engineering Classification Schemes
•
Path Enumeration Data Model is defined as 
a model that stores for each node the path (as 
a string) from the root to the node. 
•
Adjacency  List is a recursive structure for 
hierarchy representations that comprises a list 
of nodes with a linking column to their parent 
nodes
